page.title: 11A Survey of Bradley. Part 2.
page.content: We found that{60%}visited{Cleethorpes {recreational facilities.}Most use their local{sub-post office,}but tended to travel into{Grimsby Town {Centre}for regular shopping.{60%}were interested in{sport,}of these{62%}only spectate. Of those interested in sport only{25%}supported{Grimsby Town F.C. most of the rest not being interested in{football. 63%}do not use either of our local{leisure centre}and only{20% belong to a{sports club}as playing members. Just over half go out to find {entertainment}once a week or more. When asked about{facilities}that are lacking ,{Live Theatre}and a{Youth {Centre}were mentioned most often. We were pleased with the co-operation of the people who were willing to talk to us who were about{60%}of those approached.
